import check from './check.png' import edit from './draw.png' import pause from './pause.png' import play from './play-button-arrowhead.png' import trash from './trash-bin.png' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState, useReducer } from 'react'; const AdminPage = () => { const [coinsArr, setcoinsArr] = useState([]); useEffect( () => { axios.get('https://coinscore-cc-backend.onrender.com/api/collections/getcoins') .then(data => setcoinsArr(data.data.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) const initialState = { coinsArr: [], deactivatedArr: [], reviewedArr: [] } const reducerFun = (state, action) const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducerFun, initialState) const reviewedArr = coinsArr.filter((item) => item.isReviewed) const deactivatedArr = coinsArr.filter((item) => !(item.isActive)) return(

Admin Panel

CRUD for crypto coin Database!

Review Coins

{ coinsArr.map(coin =>

{coin.coinName}

{coin.coinAcro}

) }

Deactivated Coins

ACoolToken

ACT

Edit Coins

ACoolToken

ACT

); } export default AdminPage;
